bibl.title: Traffic on the Roads between Coptos and the Red Sea.
bibl.note: What were the transportation needs on the road from Coptos to Myos Hormos (Quft-Quseir) in antiquity and how were they provided for? - References.

bibl.title: Life on the Fringe. Living in the Southern Egyptian Deserts during the Roman and Early-Byzantine Periods. Proceedings of a Colloquium Held on the Occasion of the 25th Anniversary of the Netherlands Institute for Archaeology and Arabic Studies in Cairo 9-12 December 1996

Proceedings of a Colloquium Held on the Occasion of the 25th Anniversary of the Netherlands Institute for Archaeology and Arabic Studies in Cairo 9-12 December 1996 = CNWS Publications. 71 (Leiden, 1998) pp. 63-74, 1 carte.
